title: 163 - The Best Fast Food Fries
description: The boys lead off the show today by jumping right into their weekend adventures followed by catching up on their favorite movies and television shows they have been watching and give their full opinions on the Black Widow. They then jump right into the Pod FOD which comes from all things around the internet. Spanning from their favorite fast food fries, the first pictures from the Jackass 4 filming, to their opinions on state fair rides. Make sure to subscribe to youtube.come/thepodpmi to watch full episodes and don't forget to send your submissions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on twitter and instagram. We appreciate you rocking with us and we'll see you Friday, Cheers.
